#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This application is developed in Qt 4.6.3 under Kubuntu 10.04 using taglib. So you need install "libqt4-dev" and "libtag1-dev".

For Windows you need Qt and taglib




= Details =

Steps for Linux: 
   * sudo apt-get install libqt4-dev libtag1-dev
   * cd /QartRockbox/ 
   * qmake make 
   * ./QartRockbox

Steps for Windows: 
   * I used taglib-1.6 for mingw, I donwloaded from https://code.google.com/p/clementine-player/downloads/detail?name=taglib-1.6.1.zip&can=2&q=label:CrossCompiling
   * I compiled with QtCreator 1.3.1
